hero.title: Software Developer & Problem Solver

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm Wilfredo Paiz, a passionate software developer with expertise in building modern web applications. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I create seamless user experiences backed by robust architecture.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving, allowing me to deliver solutions that are both innovative and maintainable.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.allProjectsDescription: A collection of my work spanning web applications, mobile development, and more. Each project represents a unique challenge and solution.
